duties_responsibilities.duty: Design and implement CRM and customer experience solutions in Salesforce, Dynamics, etc.
Lead digital solution architecture and implementation programs in the contact center space.
Create business cases for technology-driven transformation and conduct roadmap sessions with business leadership.
Define, blueprint, and implement technology solutions, integrations, AI, and ML to enhance customer experience.
Lead POCs, pilots, and MVPs to scale implementations and provide ownership of technical solution deliverables.
Provide solution consulting, technical design, and sales support for account opportunities.
Participate in discovery and consulting engagements, document business and infrastructure requirements, and lead programs from solutions to implementation/rollout.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Information Technology or related field (Master's preferred)
